document.full_text: brandon knight knocked down a jumper with 5 seconds remaining as the fourth-seeded wildcats stunned top-seeded ohio state on friday in the east regional semifinals.
document.title: east: kentucky 62, ohio state 60: kentucky edges ohio state on knight's jumper
lines_and_colors: brandon knight knocked down a jumper with 5 seconds remaining as the fourth-seeded wildcats stunned top-seeded ohio state on friday in the east regional semifinals.
